text: 2019–20 Iran Football's 2nd Division is the 19th under 2nd Division since its establishment (current format) in 2001. The season featured 21 teams from the 2nd Division 2018–19, one new team relegated from the 2018–19 Azadegan League: Shahrdari Mahshahr, and six new teams promoted from the 3rd Division 2018–19: Shahrdari Astara, Melli Haffari Ahvaz, Esteghlal Molasani, Milad Mehr Iranian Tehran, Darayi Bandar Gaz, Shohadaye Razakan Karaj.https://iranleague.ir/fa/News/Detail/113168/%D9%82%D8%B1%D8%B9%D9%87-%D9%83%D8%B4%D9%8A-%D9%85%D8%B3%D8%A7%D8%A8%D9%82%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D9%84%D9%8A%DA%AF-%D8%AF%D8%B3%D8%AA%D9%87-%D8%AF%D9%88%D9%85-%D8%A8%D8%B1%DA%AF%D8%B2%D8%A7%D8%B1-%D8%B4%D8%AF These changes has been applied before the season: {| class="wikitable" |- !
